TopicTitle: Staging menu doesn't show up on launch & craft uncontrollable (if large enough?)

Articles.Content:
First, let me note the mods I'm using:

AIES Aerospace

Kerbal Engineer Redux

Home Grown Rockets

Firespitter

Hooligan Labs

KerbinSide

Procedural Fairings

Stage Recovery

TextureReplacer

Now, what I'm trying to launch is really not all that large, about this size. Exhibit A:

Just your average Apollo-Style spacecraft, nothing of note here. But whenever I try to launch, I'm greeted with this.. (Exhibit :

The staging light is greyed, there aren't any stages to be seen. And when I try to look at my funds/rep/science... (Exhibit C):

Also note that whenever I try to enable anything manually, by right-clicking, all the stage-symbols collapse into a single zero tab.

Also finally see that I can't revert flight due to this bug; I have to exit to Space Center and recover the flight from there (it also may help to note that launching the ship didn't seem to subtract from my total.) (Exhibit D):

I've also included a slice of what I saw in the debug menu to try to help you figure it out while I attempt to upload my logs.

Thanks in advance for the support.
